name: Float
highlight: The easiest and most efficient way to gain long or short exposure to a wide variety of magic internet assets without the risk of liquidation or over-collateralization.
summary: Float is a multi-chain, peer-to-peer, yield-enhanced, floating asset exposure mechanism. Put simply, Float is the easiest and safest way for users to buy magic internet assets. Users do not need to worry about over-collateralization, or suddenly getting liquidated. Float is a novel protocol, creating an efficient magic internet asset marketplace, governed entirely by code, allowing anyone around the world to get involved.
